title: Strengthening Teaching Method Practical Competencies: Integrating Basic Accounting Concepts Through Self-Managed Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners recognize the spatial separation of accounting data and can reorganize information by applying text-diagram integration strategies.
Learners can explain accounting concepts (assets/liabilities/equity) with 80% or higher accuracy using self-regulated learning techniques.
Learners analyze the effectiveness of self-regulated learning from a gender-sensitive perspective and apply it to instructional design.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
